comments:

I was able to initialize an ecore diagram file using the attached model using the latest GMF build.  Perhaps you can use the latest nightly build and try again?

The problem is not during intialization, this happens during the action "Arrange All" as stated in the bug title.
I have installed the nightly build and the problem persists.
Problem seems to be not repeatable with latest version of Ecore editor.
